manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shampoo Gently cleanses to help prolong color vibrancy as well as maintain depth, tone, and shine. Conditioner Hair is left soft and detangled with extra shine and depth of color. Deep Treatment Indulgent textures maintain and restore all types of color-treated hair for shiny, vibrant results. Toning Shampoo Neutralizes brass and unwanted warm tones in blonde hair while conditioning and protecting hair from breakage.

How long will my color last between appointments? This product helps salon hair color stay vibrant for up to 20 washes*. *When using the professional products system of Color Last Shampoo and Conditioner. Can it be used on bleached hair? Yes, it can be used on pre-lightened hair. Is this product vegan? Yes, it is vegan. Did the Biolage Professional packaging change? Yes, as of 2022 we have a new look with the same iconic formula. It’s the same great performance you know and love, now with a refreshed look! Are all Biolage Professional products sold on Amazon.com authentic and official? Yes, Amazon.com is an authorized retailer and only sells authentic Biolage Professional products.

Commitment to Sustainability From formulas to packaging, all of our products are produced through responsible manufacturing and green science. Sensorial Experiences Iconic uplifting fragrances act as a meaningful emotional trigger that represents a moment of small indulgence, escape and revitalization. Innovation in Conditioning Biolage was the first brand to introduce a silicone-free conditioning balm and the first to teach stylists the benefits of reverse washing. Cruelty Free All Biolage products are now officially cruelty-free. The brand has been given the Leaping Bunny stamp of approval by Cruelty Free International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo and worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best shampoos ever. This one’s for color treated hair and it works great. I love the way it makes my hair feel and it stays clean longer than with other shampoos. I would highly recommend it for color treated hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and gentle on color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Biolage Color Last Shampoo:
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo is somewhat expensive but of good quality and does not make my hair dry. It was great receiving the shampoo from Amazon because at the grocery store the biolage shampoo is not always in stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time trying this product. Recommended by my hair colorist. I absolutely love the scent. I purchased pump nozzle to make this easier to use however. I will continue using this product as long as I color my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only 1.7 fluid oz travel size like bottle
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this product because I know Biolage professionals is a good shampoo which has a fabulous scent and leaves hair feeling and looking healthy and soft. I loved the scent a lot. The only thing I was a little disappointed about was the amount of shampoo is only 1.7 fluid oz like a travel size bottle at a bit of a high price for the amount you get per bottle. This brand is usually out of my budget range so I rarely can purchase it but if I could afford it I'd definitely buy it all the time. Perfect for hotel stays, travelling, or even to use every once in a while for better hair at this size of a bottle of you don't mind running out quicker of the product or can afford a top notch brand such as this one. When I can afford it I'd buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🌈✨ Biolage ColorLast Shampoo - The Secret to Radiant, Long-Lasting Color! 🌟🧴
reviews.reviewText: Let's talk about a love story that's as epic as any Hollywood romance – me and Biolage ColorLast Shampoo! This stuff isn't just shampoo; it's the guardian angel of my hair color. 🌈💖🧖‍♀️ Color TLC: If you're like me and your hair is a canvas for your artistic color expressions, this shampoo is your new BFF. It doesn't just cleanse; it's like a color-saving superhero. Say goodbye to color-stripping villains!✨ Color Brilliance: Imagine your hair is a star on the red carpet, and Biolage ColorLast Shampoo is the paparazzi's flash. It's here to ensure your color stays vibrant, deep, and shiny, like you just stepped out of a high-end salon.🚿 Shower Symphony: Using this shampoo is like attending a daily hair spa concert. Apply to wet hair and lather with a massaging motion – cue the relaxing music. Rinse thoroughly, and voila! Your hair feels pampered and ready to shine.🌱 Eco-Friendly Glam: Are you a friend of the environment? Great news – this shampoo is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of parabens and silicones. It's like a guilt-free spa day for your hair!So, here's the deal: Biolage ColorLast Shampoo isn't just a shampoo; it's a love letter to your hair. It's the reason your color stays fabulous for up to 9 weeks, and it's the secret to that salon-quality hair swish. Treat yourself and your hair to a dose of luxury! 💇‍♀️🌈🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the product
reviews.reviewText: I love the product and got it for a great price. I have been using it for years and it is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just received the color wow shampoo and conditioner set today and I had to try them out immediately after reading all the awesome reviews (And also my Aunt, who has beautiful hair, highly recommended it!). My hair was so dry and dull from coloring it, and I have only been using the name brand shampoos and conditioners from Walmart with no improvement. I used the shampoo and conditioner today when I received it, and after just one use I can already tell a huge difference!!! My hair is SO much softer and it's shiny! I just can't get over how soft it is! AND it feels light and clean. Most "moisturizing" shampoos and conditioners weigh my hair down and leaves my hair feeling heavy and coated, almost like I hadn't rinsed the conditioner out well enough, but not this glorious shampoo and conditioner!!! I can't praise this stuff enough! HIGHLY recommend this shampoo and conditioner! This will be the only shampoo and conditioner I use from now on! I'm so glad I finally found the good stuff :)
